If you happen to accidentally install the Win7 loader over your Genuine Win7 the go into the advanced settings and uninstall the eXtremeloader (first uninstall option I think)

You then may still have the Genuine thing saying its not a genuine windows when it is, so all you have to do is go to my computer > then click on system properties.... and then change your product code to the one on the back of your Win7 case

used it on office2010 i have windows 7ultimate and it worked great and i don't get the message from Microsoft. just make sure u block your antivirus..  thanks great upload 2 thumbs up..  followed instructions by Greenlava7: 
To Activate OFFICE 2010

To Activate download "Win7 Loader Extreme" at the following link: http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5621974/Windows_7_Loader_eXtreme_Edition_v3.503-NAPALUM_DiBYA

Extract with WinRar and place the extracted W7lxe.exe into C drive (C:\\)

Then go to 'Run' from start menu and type "C:\\w7lxe.exe /office2010" press enter and you are done!, Office 2010 is Activated & Updates work also. Enjoy!

ALSO from my own experience i had to disable my AVG 9.0 Resident Shield firewall, and also allow it to go through my Microsoft firewall, which i was automatically prompted to do by MS. Then i re-ran the command and it worked like a charm! Three cheers for Firefuze, Win7 Loader, and this uploader!
